visualization_prompt: Generate a solid gauge chart showing performance percentage using a single-value radial visualization with custom styling
visualization_explanation: The dataset contains a single quantitative performance metric (75%) visualized through a solid gauge. Synthetic data follows domain conventions for percentage-based KPIs. The solid gauge maximizes data-ink ratio by eliminating unnecessary gridlines and ticks while maintaining clear numerical orientation through the central label. Color choice (#27ae60) follows Cairo's preattentive processing principles for quick value interpretation. The radial gradient in the pane background creates depth perception, while the rounded linecap and border radius soften the visual geometry. Font sizing hierarchy (32px data label vs 14px axis labels) directs attention appropriately according to Tufte's layering principles.
